css:
<style>
.print-format {
    margin-left:05mm;
    margin-top:05mm;
    margin-right:05mm;
    margin-bottom:05mm;
    page-size: A6;
}
.print-format td, .print-format th {
    vertical-align: top !important;
    padding: 0.5px !important;
}
@media screen {
    .print-format {
    /*PRINTABLE WIDTH: 21.0cm */
    width: 4in;
    /*PRINTABLE HEIGHT: 29.7cm*/
    /*PADDING FROM MARGINS: 0.9cm, .354331in */
    padding: 0.5cm;
    }
    }
.float-container {
    border: 3px solid #fff;
    padding: 2px;
}

.float-child {
    width: 50%;
    float: left;
    padding: 2px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}
.blue{
    text-align:right;
}
.float-child-2{
    width: 50%;
    float:left;
    padding:2px;
}
.float-container-2 {
    padding: 5px;
}
.head-section{
    border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}
</style>
html:
Date: {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.date).strftime('%d-%b-%Y %I:%M%p') }} {% if doc.print_date_time %}
Print Date: {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.print_date_time).strftime('%d-%b-%Y %I:%M%p') }} {% endif %}
{{doc.sal_sto_barcode}}
{% set type = frappe.db.get_value("Customer", doc.customer, "customer_type") %} {% if type == "Company" %}

Company - {{ doc.customer }}

{% endif %} Customer - {{doc.customer}}
Source - {{ frappe.db.get_value("Sales Order", doc.locations[0].sales_order, "source")}}
{{doc.barcode}}
{% if doc.is_rush == 1 -%}
RUSHORDER!!!
{% endif %}
{%- for row in doc.locations -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.discount_amount -%} {%- endif -%}
Sr RetailSKU Item Name Pick Qty Ifw Location Barcodes
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.retailskusuffix }} {{ row.item_name }} {{row.picked_qty }} {% if row.ifw_location %} {% set locations = row.ifw_location.split('|') %} {% for location in locations %} {{ location }}
{% endfor %} {% endif %} 		{% set item = frappe.get_doc("Item", row.item_code) %} {% for barcode in item.barcodes %} {{ barcode.barcode }}
{% endfor %}

{{doc.get_formatted("pl_text")}}
name: PickList 4x6 - V2
